## AbstractConnector.importGeometry() method

Subclasses can override this. By default we just set the given geometry as our internal representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
importGeometry(g: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  g | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
